org.fujion.annotation

Annotation Type Component


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Component
    Class annotation to control deserialization of a Fujion resource.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String tag
      The XML tag corresponding to this component.
      String widgetClass
      The JavaScript class for the widget.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Component.ChildTag[] childTag
      The allowable child tag(s) for this component, including cardinality.
      Component.ContentHandling content
      How to handle text content associated with the tag.
      Class<? extends ComponentFactory> factoryClass
      The class of the factory for creating this component.
      String[] parentTag
      The allowable parent tag(s) for this component.
      String widgetModule
      The JavaScript module containing the widget.

    • Element Detail

      • tag

        public abstract String tag
        The XML tag corresponding to this component.
        Returns:
        The XML tag corresponding to this component.

      • widgetClass

        public abstract String widgetClass
        The JavaScript class for the widget.
        Returns:
        The JavaScript widget class.

      • content

        How to handle text content associated with the tag.
        Returns:
        The content handling.
        Default:
        org.fujion.annotation.Component.ContentHandling.ERROR

      • parentTag

        public abstract String[] parentTag
        The allowable parent tag(s) for this component.
        Returns:
        The allowable parent tag(s).
        Default:
        {}

      • childTag

        public abstract Component.ChildTag[] childTag
        The allowable child tag(s) for this component, including cardinality.
        Returns:
        The allowable child tag(s).
        Default:

      • factoryClass

        public abstract Class<? extends ComponentFactory> factoryClass
        The class of the factory for creating this component.

      • widgetModule

        public abstract String widgetModule
        The JavaScript module containing the widget.
        Returns:
        The JavaScript module name.
        Default:
        "fujion-widget"
